FoliageSpawner: The procedural foliage spawner used to generate foliage instances within this volume.
TileOverlap: The amount of overlap between simulation tiles (in cm).
bAllowLandscape: Whether to place foliage on landscape
bAllowBSP: Whether to place foliage on BSP
bAllowStaticMesh: Whether to place foliage on StaticMesh
bAllowTranslucent: Whether to place foliage on translucent geometry
bAllowFoliage: Whether to place foliage on other blocking foliage geometry
bShowDebugTiles: Whether to visualize the tiles used for the foliage spawner simulation
